scenario_text.value: Tch... You guys just don’t get it.

Whatever. I’ll find Miu, even if that means
I have to do it alone.
What? Hey! You can’t just leave!
My sister and I are going that way, too.
Hey, wait! You two shouldn’t be alone!
Don’t worry. We’ll be with Kaito.

Well, there they go. Are they really going to
be all right?

If they’re headed that way, they’ll end up in
the same spot. That’s just the long way.

So don’t worry, I’m sure it will all work out
in the end.

(Hm? She seems...different all of a sudden.
Or...maybe not. I don’t know.)

That’s a relief. We can all meet up again at
the tower!

Yeah, and it sounds like this way we can take
our time. This was the right choice!

Indeed. I am also curious about this cable
car.
Aw, yeah! I can’t wait! Let’s go!
